title: LegendaryAccss
author: LegendaryAccss
content: HelloHave $229 usdt, need doge or pepe coin. I can send first.Due to my poor feedback, I'm ready to send first.Telegram ~ @HeroAccs1

comments.author: ChuckBuck
comments.body: So, I wonder, why don't you send it to any exchange and do the trade. I'm pretty sure the current exchanges have a minimum trade limit that is not too high, it should be enough for you to make any trades. Exchange between popular alt coins is not necessary, P2P is more time consuming, the exchange can do it well. Can you explain?

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Can’t you even do this sort of trade in the metamask wallet? Fees might be high but I imagine they will be nothing compared to what you’ll lose buying pepe coin. Plus, if metamask ever does an airdrop maybe you’ll qualify for using their in wallet exchange. I imagine sites like Uniswap or whatever people are using nowadays would work also.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: Quote from: OgNasty on May 09, 2023, 07:48:31 PMCan’t you even do this sort of trade in the metamask wallet? Fees might be high but I imagine they will be nothing compared to what you’ll lose buying pepe coin. Plus, if metamask ever does an airdrop maybe you’ll qualify for using their in wallet exchange. I imagine sites like Uniswap or whatever people are using nowadays would work also. He can do the swap using Metamask but I think he's doing this because of the high fees that he can't bear. It will still require him to pay such fees and thus, he's looking for an alternative. @OP, it's still needed to pay some fee if this is the solution that you're trying to find.But check it out eventually later if the fees have dropped down, I guess that we're starting to see the drop of the fees.

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: Do you have the money on wallet or in an exchange. If you have in wallet it is better to exchange it through Dex even ETH right now has low fee. If you have money on a centralized exchange buy on Binance or pretty much other cex now has a pepe and doge
